page.title: 11Cults East Church
page.content: Cults East Church was built in 1901. One Saturday in January 1941 the church was burnt down.The fire started in the boiler-room and many people think that it was caused by the boiler being stoked up too high with coal. This caused the fire door to burst open and hot coals set fire to the building. There is now only a small part of the old church still standing.The present building was built in 1959.It was not built in 1941 because the war was on and only essential buildings were allowed.Churches were not considered essential buildings.The money for the present church was provided by the people themselves. The present minister is Donald Rennie who has been minister for 11 years.
